SELECT
'Y' AS CLASSOFF_YN,
CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.CLASSDAY, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')) >= #{globalMakLessonLimit} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CLASSOFF_YN,
'N' AS CLASSOFF_YN,
B.CODE_NAME AS CLASS_PROG_NAME, C.CODE_NAME AS CLASS_TYPE_NAME, D.CODE_NAME AS CLASS_STS_NAME, E.CODE_NAME AS CERT_STS_NAME, (SELECT (TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.CLASS_TYPE_CD, 'G019C003', BEFORE_CLASSDAY, CLASSDAY),'IW') - TO_CHAR(TERM_START_DATE,'IW') + 1) FROM CHUL_TB_UNIV WHERE UNIV_STS_CD = 'G004C001') CURR_WEEK, A.* FROM V_CHUL_VW_ATTENDMASTER A, CHUL_TB_CODEMASTER B, CHUL_TB_CODEMASTER C, CHUL_TB_CODEMASTER D, CHUL_TB_CODEMASTER E WHERE UNIV_CD=#{univ_cd} AND year=#{year} AND TERM_CD=#{term_cd} AND PROF_NO=#{prof_no}
AND TRUNC(CLASSDAY)=TRUNC(SYSDATE)
AND to_char(classday, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{classday}
AND A.CLASS_PROG_CD=B.CODE AND A.CLASS_TYPE_CD=C.CODE AND A.CLASS_STS_CD=D.CODE AND A.CERT_STS_CD=E.CODE ORDER BY CLASSHOUR_START_TIME ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR((SELECT * FROM (SELECT classday AS classday_next FROM
V_CHUL_VW_attendmaster WHERE univ_cd = #{univ_cd} AND term_cd = #{term_cd} AND prof_no = #{prof_no}
AND trunc(classday) > trunc(SYSDATE)
AND trunc(classday) > trunc(to_date(#{classday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY classday_next ASC) WHERE ROWNUM=1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS class_next, TO_CHAR((SELECT * FROM (SELECT classday AS classday_prev FROM
V_CHUL_VW_attendmaster WHERE univ_cd = #{univ_cd} AND term_cd = #{term_cd} AND prof_no = #{prof_no}
AND trunc(classday) < trunc(SYSDATE)
AND trunc(classday) < trunc(to_date(#{classday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY classday_prev DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS class_prev ,decode(day, 1, '일', 2, '월', 3, '화', 4, '수', 5, '목', 6, '금', 7, '토', day) classday_name,
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLASSDAY, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MYCLASSDAY
#{classday} AS CLASSDAY, DECODE(#{classday}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{classday}, #{classday}) AS MYCLASSDAY
from
(select to_char(to_date(sysdate), 'D') day
(select to_char(to_date(#{classday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'D') day
from dual)

SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NO, A.* FROM ( SELECT CLS.UNIV_CD, CLS.YEAR, CLS.TERM_CD, CLS.SUBJECT_CD, CLS.SUBJECT_DIV_CD, CLS.PROF_NO, CLS.CLASS_CD, CLS.CLASSHOUR_START_TIME, HOUR.CLASSHOUR_END_TIME, CLS.CLASSDAY_NO, CLS.CLASS_NAME, CLS.CLASSDAY_NAME, CLS.CLASSHOUR_NAME, CLS.PROF_NAME, CLS.PROF_COLL_NAME, CLS.PROF_DEPT_NAME, CLS.CLASSROOM_NO, CLS.CLASS_PROG_CD, CLS.CLASS_ADM_CD, CLS.REG_ETC, CLS.REG_DATE, CLS.IS_TEAM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_CHUL_VW_ATTENDEE AD WHERE 1=1 AND UNIV_CD = CLS.UNIV_CD AND YEAR = CLS.YEAR AND TERM_CD = CLS.TERM_CD AND SUBJECT_CD = CLS.SUBJECT_CD AND SUBJECT_DIV_CD = CLS.SUBJECT_DIV_CD) AS ATTENDEE_CNT FROM V_CHUL_VW_CLASS CLS, V_CHUL_VW_CLASSHOUR HOUR WHERE CLS.UNIV_CD=#{univ_cd} AND CLS.YEAR=#{year} AND CLS.TERM_CD=#{term_cd} AND CLS.PROF_NO=#{prof_no} AND CLS.YEAR = HOUR.YEAR AND CLS.TERM_CD = HOUR.TERM_CD AND CLS.CLASSHOUR_START_TIME = HOUR.CLASSHOUR_START_TIME ORDER BY CLS.CLASS_NAME, CLS.SUBJECT_CD, CLS.SUBJECT_DIV_CD, CLS.CLASSDAY_NO, CLS.CLASSHOUR_START_TIME ) A
